resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

comments.body: [~domoritz] could you please take a look?
That looks like a random error. Can you rerun the script and see whether it still fails?
Indeed, it disappeared on the second run. Thanks for taking a look!
[~domoritz] though there is another JS error which persists: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4879170860?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:2022

The verification successfully passed for me locally (intel mac) with node v17.0.1. 

 

I assume this error shouldn't be dependent on node's version since the linux verification task passes with the same node version (14).
Bumping node version to 16 on macOS since we test with that regularly.
